Elastic Search Hackday

Hack on projects using Elastic Search at Rackspace's San Francisco office.

We’re hanging out in ##gibson on irc.freenode.net

28. March, 2012

Hack all day, or come watch the demos and hang out afterwards. Brought to you by developers at Rackspace.

9.00 amStart Hacking
11.00 amTech Talk tba
11.15 amTech Talk tba
6.00 pmTech Talk tba
6.30 pmTech Talk tba
7.00 pmDemos (prizes sponsored by Rackspace)
8.00 pmMove to a local bar

Food, beer and skeeball provided. Bring ideas or find a team.

See you there!

  • Rackspace San Francisco
  • 620 Folsom Street (near 2nd in SoMa)
  • Suite 100 (Ground Floor)
